body_html:
@ngimel Do you have a reference for where cell clipping originated from? I've been trying to track down its source but haven't turned up anything so far.

@PetrochukM Is this something different to clip_grad_norm_ or clip_grad_value_?
body_text:
@ngimel Do you have a reference for where cell clipping originated from? I've been trying to track down its source but haven't turned up anything so far.
@PetrochukM Is this something different to clip_grad_norm_ or clip_grad_value_?
body:
@ngimel Do you have a reference for where cell clipping originated from? I've been trying to track down its source but haven't turned up anything so far.

@PetrochukM Is this something different to [`clip_grad_norm_`](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/nn.html?highlight=clip#torch.nn.utils.clip_grad_norm_) or [`clip_grad_value_`](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/nn.html?highlight=clip#torch.nn.utils.clip_grad_value_)?
